name: VR Rescue of Girls
description:
This is a VR horror game with the theme of secret room adventure. Players can wear a helmet to enter the underground secret room and experience the thrilling game of escape from the secret room.
Enter the underground secret room, the player's task is to find 12 girls in various areas of the secret room, complete the task and return to the main interface of the game. Be careful of the scary female ghosts and hidden traps that come and go at will. If you transfer to the set traps, the player needs to restart the game. The game creates a horrible tone, suitable for adventure players who love thrills.

The left handle touchpad controls the movement, and the trigger button switches the flashlight light;
The right handle touchpad controls the steering, the trigger button opens and closes the door, adjust the handle direction to control the light direction of the flashlight;
The menu button can call out the menu, the right handle can interact with the menu, and the trigger button can confirm.
